attributes.additional_details: By doing so we will be able to avoid public transport and keep delivering services and staff to businesses everywhere.
attributes.background:
Since there may be restrictions on public transport and travel we would like some assistance with travel.

Suspend Congestion Charge in London
Suspend Parking Fees across UK
Suspend ULEZ charge
Suspend Tolls and other transport related charges

rejection.details:
Parking charges are set by local authorities, not the UK Government or Parliament. Some councils have chosen to relax parking restrictions in their area, you can find out more on your council's website.

The congestion charge and ULEZ are the responsibility of the London Assembly. Since you started this petition, TfL has suspended road charging schemes:
https://tfl.gov.uk/info-for/media/press-releases/2020/march/tfl-suspends-all-road-user-charging-schemes-to-help-critical-workers?intcmp=62502

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:  

www.gov.uk/coronavirus 

https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/ 

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips 

You can also read impartial analysis of the Government response to coronavirus and policy developments here: 

https://commonslibrary.parliament.uk/coronavirus/
